item.title: Microsoft Vulnerability: Sharepoint Content Disclosure
item.description: Recently, I came across a vulnerability in Microsoft Sharepoint that allowed bypassing video content download permissions. In this post, I will share the details of the vulnerability, the reproduction process and steps, and how Microsoftâ€™s MSRC handled my report.
